UA-5.name: User Authentication
UA-5.description: Enterprise-grade user authentication with multiple security layers.

embodiment.principle: Firebase Authentication with Multi-Factor Authentication and SSO
embodiment.description: Advanced authentication with multi-factor and single sign-on capabilities.

UA-5.verification_plan: Testing on both iOS and Android devices to ensure functionality across both platforms.

TM-5.name: Task Management
TM-5.description: Comprehensive task management with enterprise features and integrations.

embodiment.principle: React Native with Redux and Enterprise Integrations
embodiment.description: Advanced task management with state management, offline capabilities, and integrations with enterprise tools.

TM-5.verification_plan: Unit and integration testing to validate data synchronization and storage.

PN-5.name: Push Notifications
PN-5.description: Advanced push notifications with personalization, scheduling, and analytics.

embodiment.principle: Firebase Cloud Messaging with Advanced Targeting and Analytics
embodiment.description: Push notifications with user segmentation, personalized content, and analytics integration.

PN-5.verification_plan: Testing push notifications on multiple devices to ensure delivery and accuracy.

DS-5.name: Data Synchronization
DS-5.description: Real-time data synchronization with conflict resolution and audit logs.

embodiment.principle: Firebase Realtime Database with Offline Support and Audit Logs
embodiment.description: Real-time data synchronization with offline capabilities, conflict resolution, and audit logging.

DS-5.verification_plan: Unit and integration testing to validate data synchronization and storage.

UI-5.name: User Interface
UI-5.description: Intuitive and responsive user interface with enterprise-grade design elements and accessibility features.

embodiment.principle: React Native with Animated Components and Accessibility Features
embodiment.description: Advanced UI with animations, responsive design, and accessibility features.

UI-5.verification_plan: Conducting usability testing with a focus group to gather feedback on the interface design.

TS-5.name: Task Sharing
TS-5.description: Advanced task sharing with granular access control, collaboration features, and audit trails.

embodiment.principle: Firebase Database with Role-Based Access Control and Audit Trails
embodiment.description: Advanced access control with roles, permissions, and audit trails for shared tasks.

TS-5.verification_plan: Testing access control and sharing functionality across multiple users.
